overview:
Daryl Rosser is an affiliate marketer and tech entrepreneur from the United Kingdom.

Daryl founded DHR One in January 2010, which was an incentive affiliate marketing company. DHR One was shut down in December 2010, and in January 2011, Rosser Media was started with the focus of affiliate marketing.

Daryl is currently working as CEO of Rosser Media, and working on a startup “CPANovate”, with Aidan Fewster. CPANovate is a revolutionary tool for affiliate marketers, allowing them to use unique technology without relying on a single affiliate network.
